Object.Name: Traffic Counter
Object.Description1: The uCIFI traffic counter provides vehicle counting and traffic analysis data. A traffic counting device may implement multiple instances of this traffic counter object, each of them being in charge of counting different categories of vehicles (e.g. bikes, cars, trucks).

Item.Name: Cumulated number
Item.Description: Cumulated number of vehicles counted since last reset.

Item.Name: Reset cumulated number
Item.Description: Reset the cumulated number of vehicles.

Item.Name: Cumulated number today
Item.Description: Cumulated number of vehicles counted today.

Item.Name: Measuring period 1
Item.Description: Time period 1 during which the counter shall provide number of vehicles (e.g. 1 hour).

Item.Name: Measuring period 2
Item.Description: Time period 2 during which the counter shall provide number of vehicles (e.g. 15 minutes).

Item.Name: Measuring period 3
Item.Description: Time period 3 during which the counter shall provide number of vehicles (e.g. 5 minutes).

Item.Name: Cumulated number during last period 1
Item.Description: Cumulated number of vehicles counted during the last period 1 (e.g. 1 hour).

Item.Name: Cumulated number during last period 2
Item.Description: Cumulated number of vehicles counted during the last period 2 (e.g. 15 minutes).

Item.Name: Cumulated number during last period 3
Item.Description: Cumulated number of vehicles counted during the last period 3 (e.g. 5 minutes).

Item.Name: Average speed during last period 1
Item.Description: Average speed measured on the vehicles during the last period 1 (e.g. 1 hour).

Item.Name: Average speed during last period 2
Item.Description: Average speed measured on the vehicles during the last period 2 (e.g. 15 minutes).

Item.Name: Average speed during last period 3
Item.Description: Average speed measured on the vehicles during the last period 3 (e.g. 5 minutes).

Item.Name: Average distance during last period 1
Item.Description: Average distance between two vehicles measured during the last period 1 (e.g. 1 hour).

Item.Name: Average distance during last period 2
Item.Description: Average distance between two vehicles measured during the last period 2 (e.g. 15 minutes).

Item.Name: Average distance during last period 3
Item.Description: Average distance between two vehicles measured during the last period 3 (e.g. 5 minutes).

Item.Name: Speed limit threshold
Item.Description: Speed limit threshold used to calculate the percentage of vehicles above speed limit.

Item.Name: Percentage above speed limit
Item.Description: Percentage of vehicles driving above speed limit.
